solution_line_template: First find the size of the second bell: {first_bell_bronze} pounds * {multiplier_second_bell} = <<{first_bell_bronze}*{multiplier_second_bell}={second_bell_bronze}>>{second_bell_bronze} pounds
Then find the size of the third bell: {second_bell_bronze} pounds * {multiplier_third_bell} = <<{second_bell_bronze}*{multiplier_third_bell}={third_bell_bronze}>>{third_bell_bronze} pounds

Then add the amount of bronze used for each bell to find the total: {second_bell_bronze} pounds + {third_bell_bronze} pounds + {first_bell_bronze} pounds = <<{second_bell_bronze}+{third_bell_bronze}+{first_bell_bronze}={total_bronze_needed}>>{total_bronze_needed} pounds
